name: next-netlify-starter
diagnosis: The build failure is due to an EJSONPARSE error while parsing the package.json file at position 142. The error message indicates that there is an unexpected token '/' in the JSON structure.
solution:
To resolve this issue:
1. Open the package.json file in the project repository.
2. Navigate to position 142 in the file to identify the unexpected token '/'.
3. Correct the JSON syntax error at that position by either removing the unexpected token '/' or fixing the syntax issue.
4. After making the necessary adjustments, commit the changes to the repository.
5. Trigger a new build on Netlify to ensure the issue is resolved successfully.
